itunes:summary: In this episode of Build Things On Purpose, we speak with Armon Dadgar, CTO and co-founder of Hashicorp about building reliable systems and how their new tools Boundary and Waypoint help you accomplish that.
itunes:subtitle: In this episode of Build Things On Purpose, we speak with Armon Dadgar, CTO and co-founder of Hashicorp about building reliable systems and how their new tools Boundary and Waypoint help you accomplish that.
itunes:keywords: reliability, resilience, chaos, engineering, SRE, technology, programming, infrastructure
